column5: Happy Birthday Brian !!!Ya dont look a day older than Roy
Haaaa Haaa, Your old! happy birthday.
happy B-day Slowpoke, although that name doesn't really apply anymore going to start calling you the yellow streak
Happy Birthday !!
Happy Birthday Brian, hope it's a good one.
Hey Brian I hope yer going to have a great Bday today   Cheers Mike
Have a great day, Brian. You don't look a day over ummm, whatever.
All the best Brian, have a goodun !!
Happy birthday buddy!
happy b-day brian. are you at the age where you dont count them anymore lol.
Happy Birthday Brian!!!!  Take the day off work today, you have my permission..
Happy Birthday Brian have a great day bud
LOL George; its not that I don't try, I just keep forgetting where I left off!  Thanks for all the birthday greets guys!
have a great day Brian, I recommend a little fishing...  Maureen
Hope it's a good one.   Happy Birthday Brian.
Happy B day Brian now get to work so you can buy yourself a present from me....and make it something nice I don't want to look cheap or nothing.    Art
Happy Birthday Brian.  Hope you have a super day and a special dinner tonight  Joey
Happy Birthday Brian!
Slow down and just Poke around today Brian !!
Happy Bday!
Took ya long enough to get this young....no wonder they call you Slowpoke  Happy Bday!
Happy Birthday Brian!  I hope you get everything you wish for my friend!
HAPPY BIRTHDAY BIG GUY!!
Cheers Buddy, I hope you're having a good day!
Happy B-day, Brian!!  Looking forward to getting out musky fishing with you, again!
Best Fishes to you, Brian.  Hope all is well with you and yours.  I got you some new tires for my car - Eagle GTs rock on my little Maz.
Have a good one Slowpoke! It's also my son's 9th birthday today... we'll be hitting the brand new Lego this evening! LOL HH
Happy Birthday SSLLLOOOOWWWWWPPPPPPOOOOOOOKKKKKKKKEEEEEEEEE have a great one SBK
HAPPY BIRTHDAY BIG GUY.
Happy birthday Brian Hope your having a great one!!!
